parameters.name: Radiate
parameters.description: Radiate mold parting surface as defined by swPartingSurfaceMoldParmType_e

parameters.name: ReverseAlignment
parameters.description: True to reverse alignment, false to not; only available when radiate set to swPartingSurfaceMoldParmNormal and a parting line does not yet exist (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ReverseOffset
parameters.description: True to reverse offset direction, false to not

parameters.name: OffsetDistance
parameters.description: True to reverse offset direction, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of mold parting surface; only available when radiate set to either swPartingSurfaceMoldParmTangent or swPartingSurfaceMoldParmNormal

parameters.name: Smooth
parameters.description: Smooth mold parting surface as defined by swPartingSurfaceSmoothingType_e

parameters.name: SmoothDistance
parameters.description: Distance to smooth mold parting surface; only available when smooth set to swPartingSurfaceSmooth

parameters.name: Knit
parameters.description: True to knit all surfaces, false to not

title: IFeatureManager.InsertMoldPartingSurface
description: Inserts a mold parting surface feature.
signature:
Feature InsertMoldPartingSurface( 
   System.Int32
Radiate
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseAlignment
,
   System.Boolean
ReverseOffset
,
   System.Double
OffsetDistance
,
   System.Double
Angle
,
   System.Int32
Smooth
,
   System.Double
SmoothDistance
,
   System.Boolean
Knit
)

parameters.name: Radiate
parameters.description: Radiate mold parting surface as defined by swPartingSurfaceMoldParmType_e

parameters.name: ReverseAlignment
parameters.description: True to reverse alignment, false to not; only available when radiate set to swPartingSurfaceMoldParmNormal and a parting line does not yet exist (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ReverseOffset
parameters.description: True to reverse offset direction, false to not

parameters.name: OffsetDistance
parameters.description: True to reverse offset direction, false to not

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Angle of mold parting surface; only available when radiate set to either swPartingSurfaceMoldParmTangent or swPartingSurfaceMoldParmNormal

parameters.name: Smooth
parameters.description: Smooth mold parting surface as defined by swPartingSurfaceSmoothingType_e

parameters.name: SmoothDistance
parameters.description: Distance to smooth mold parting surface; only available when smooth set to swPartingSurfaceSmooth

parameters.name: Knit
parameters.description: True to knit all surfaces, false to not

remarks:
f a parting line feature does not yet exist in the model, you must first select the direction of pull and the edges for the parting line using
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
. For example, a face (direction of pull) has a mark of 1 and edges (parting lines) a mark of 4.
